Package lu.uni.geko.weaver.copy

The copy package of the weaver plug-in for GeKo, a generic model weaver.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Copier The interface to be implemented by clients that are to be returned by extend the extension point lu.uni.geko.weaver.copy.copierfactoryext.
CopierFactoryExt The interface to be implemented by clients that extend the extension point lu.uni.geko.weaver.copy.copierfactoryext.
 

Class Summary
DefaultCopier The default implementation of the interface Copier that is responsible for creating base elements corresponding to existing advice elements for the CopierFactoryExt extension point.

It currently implements the global and per join point advice instantiation scope.

To copy the elements it uses a AbstractDeferringManuallyReferencingRecursivePkgVariantCopier which is a modified version of EcoreUtil.Copier.
DefaultCopierFactory The default implementation of the extension point lu.uni.geko.weaver.copy.copierfactoryext returning a different copier for every new root element of a woven model.
MainCopier A utility class to access the functionality provided by extensions of the CopierFactoryExt extension point.
 

Package lu.uni.geko.weaver.copy Description

The copy package of the weaver plug-in for GeKo, a generic model weaver. Responsible for creating copies of advice elements that are instances of the original metamodel.
